metadata.title: CVE-2021-22959 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The parser in accepts requests with a space (SP) right after the headername before the colon. This can lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS) inllhttp < v2.1.4 and < v6.0.6.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
